data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Ah! McQueen-san, you're back!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>Ah! McQueen-san, you're back!

data.text: McQueen-san! Great job!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>McQueen-san! Great job!

data.text: You all came all this way to see me?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>You all came all this way to see me?

data.text: Just barely second place, huh? Still a great match though.
data.name: Gold Ship

choices.text: Your competitor today was really something, huh?
choices.processed: <size=33>Your competitor today was really something, huh?</size>

choices.text: Your competitor today was really something, huh?
choices.processed: <size=33>Your competitor today was really something, huh?</size>

data.processed: <story>Just barely second place, huh? Still a great match though.

data.text:
Yes, there is no doubt about that. I had perfect coordination and 
I was able to stay concentrated when it mattered most.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Yes, there is no doubt about that. I had perfect coordination and 
<story>I was able to stay concentrated when it mattered most.

data.text: Today, I was simply outmatched.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Today, I was simply outmatched.

data.text: You're looking completely refreshed, you know?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>You're looking completely refreshed, you know?

data.text:
That's because that race taught me so many things. Like what I am 
currently lacking, and what I need to develop for the future.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>That's because that race taught me so many things. Like what I am 
<story>currently lacking, and what I need to develop for the future.

data.text: I've learned so many things from this race alone. Moreover…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I've learned so many things from this race alone. Moreover…

data.text: Moreover?
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed: <story>Moreover?

data.text: Unlike the Japan Cup, today I am happy with how I ran today.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Unlike the Japan Cup, today I am happy with how I ran today.

data.text:
I was able to turn the expectations that you all had for me into 
my own power/strength, allowing me to run with all my might.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I was able to turn the expectations that you all had for me into 
<story>my own power/strength, allowing me to run with all my might.

data.text: McQueen-san, you're going to do great in the next race!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>McQueen-san, you're going to do great in the next race!

data.text: Yes, of course I will.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Yes, of course I will.

data.text: I believe in you, Ace!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>I believe in you, Ace!

data.text:
You're going to show us another amazing 
race, aren't you, McQueen-chan!?
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed:
<story>You're going to show us another amazing 
<story>race, aren't you, McQueen-chan!?

data.text: I'll show you all a race that will live up to the title of “Ace.”
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I'll show you all a race that will live up to the title of “Ace.”

data.text:
Alrighty then! Now that the race's over, 
Trainer's gonna treat us to dinner!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Alrighty then! Now that the race's over, 
<story>Trainer's gonna treat us to dinner!

data.text: Yup! I've withdrawn from my savings account just for this moment!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yup! I've withdrawn from my savings account just for this moment!

data.text: Yup! I've withdrawn from my savings account just for this moment!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yup! I've withdrawn from my savings account just for this moment!

data.text: I mentioned it, did I not…?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I mentioned it, did I not…?

data.text:
I've been on a restrictive diet in preparation 
for today's race, so I'm quite famished.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I've been on a restrictive diet in preparation 
<story>for today's race, so I'm quite famished.

data.text:
I guess we'll be teaching you a harsh lesson on 
how insatiable our appetites really are.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I guess we'll be teaching you a harsh lesson on 
<story>how insatiable our appetites really are.

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Eh…?

data.text: Ah, that's right! Why don't we invite Oguri and Ryan as well!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Ah, that's right! Why don't we invite Oguri and Ryan as well!

data.text:
Wai-! Hold on, wait a second! My wallet 
won't be able to survive this!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Wai-! Hold on, wait a second! My wallet 
<story>won't be able to survive this!

data.text:
Wai-! Hold on, wait a second! My wallet 
won't be able to survive this!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Wai-! Hold on, wait a second! My wallet 
<story>won't be able to survive this!

data.text: Don't be so stingy! Anyways, let's go!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Don't be so stingy! Anyways, let's go!

data.text: Hehe, let's go, Trainer-san!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Hehe, let's go, Trainer-san!

data.text:
The team that was born from Oguri Cap's miracle 
during the Arima Kinen: Team Sirius…
data.processed:
<story>The team that was born from Oguri Cap's miracle 
<story>during the Arima Kinen: Team Sirius…

data.text:
Its new trainer and its new ace clumsily made their way through 
races and eventually formed a proper team.
data.processed:
<story>Its new trainer and its new ace clumsily made their way through 
<story>races and eventually formed a proper team.

data.text:
We still have a long way to go to be 
as great as we once were, but…
data.processed:
<story>We still have a long way to go to be 
<story>as great as we once were, but…

data.text:
The values and ideas that we inherited from the former members of 
our team continue to resonate between us.
data.processed:
<story>The values and ideas that we inherited from the former members of 
<story>our team continue to resonate between us.

data.text: Okay everyone, I'm heading out.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Okay everyone, I'm heading out.

data.text: You can do this, Ace!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>You can do this, Ace!

data.text:
Remember, if you manage to keep your title, Trainer'll treat you 
to as many sweets as you'd like!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Remember, if you manage to keep your title, Trainer'll treat you 
<story>to as many sweets as you'd like!

data.text: Wait, really!?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Wait, really!?

data.text:
You weren't supposed to tell her that yet! She's going to lose 
her concentration because of that!
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed:
<story>You weren't supposed to tell her that yet! She's going to lose 
<story>her concentration because of that!

data.text:
Figured it'd help get her fired up, but I 
guess it had the opposite effect, huh?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Figured it'd help get her fired up, but I 
<story>guess it had the opposite effect, huh?

data.text: Ace, concentrate… concentrate!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>Ace, concentrate… concentrate!

data.text: Y-You're right. Concentrate… Concentrate… Confectionaries…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Y-You're right. Concentrate… Concentrate… Confectionaries…

data.text: McQueen, your opponent today is the undefeated Tokai Teio.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>McQueen, your opponent today is the undefeated Tokai Teio.

data.text: McQueen, your opponent today is the undefeated Tokai Teio.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>McQueen, your opponent today is the undefeated Tokai Teio.

data.text:
Judging from her prior races, her strength is the real deal. 
Moreover, she's predicted to win this race as well.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Judging from her prior races, her strength is the real deal. 
<story>Moreover, she's predicted to win this race as well.

data.text: But regardless of those facts, you will win this race!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>But regardless of those facts, you will win this race!

data.text: But regardless of those facts, you will win this race!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>But regardless of those facts, you will win this race!

data.text:
Hehe, leave it to me. With all of you by my side and pushing me 
forward, I feel like I can accomplish anything!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, leave it to me. With all of you by my side and pushing me 
<story>forward, I feel like I can accomplish anything!

data.text: Thank you, I will definitely win this race!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Thank you, I will definitely win this race!

data.text: (Wooooooaaaaaahhh―!!)
data.processed: <story>(Wooooooaaaaaahhh―!!)

data.text:
Mejiro McQueen! Mejiro McQueen! She's 
created a 3 horse-length lead!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro McQueen! Mejiro McQueen! She's 
<story>created a 3 horse-length lead!

data.text:
Mejiro McQueen crosses the finish line in first place!! She is 
the first Uma Musume to win the Spring Tenno Sho twice in a row!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Mejiro McQueen crosses the finish line in first place!! She is 
<story>the first Uma Musume to win the Spring Tenno Sho twice in a row!

data.text: (Wooooooaaaaaahhh―!!)
data.processed: <story>(Wooooooaaaaaahhh―!!)

data.text: Congrats, McQueen-san!!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>Congrats, McQueen-san!!

data.text: Oohh! I'm so moved!!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>Oohh! I'm so moved!!

data.text: Our Ace… She really is something special, huh?
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed: <story>Our Ace… She really is something special, huh?

data.text: Thank you so much, everyone!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Thank you so much, everyone!

data.text: I will continue to carry our dreams forward!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I will continue to carry our dreams forward!
